title: (4785-187) Trofa - 306 Rua Infante Dom Henrique
description: Self laudry service, modern machines. Wifi and coffee available as well.

title: (4785) Trofa - 647 Rua Cónegos de Landim
description: Small car park opposite the main market square (Attention: market from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. only on Saturdays). Quiet place, not too much traffic at night. Ideal for troubleshooting one night.

title: (4785) Trofa - 318 Rua Doutor António Faria
description: Picnic park, quiet but without services. There are tables and cozy shade. There are two tables, it is in the middle of a town in a large park.

title: (4760) Ribeirão - 5 Avenida Central
description:
Quiet place to spend the night, we went to visit the Atlantic bird contest.


It's like the back of a shopping center, where trucks usually spend the night. There are public toilets that were surprisingly clean. The street is illuminated with streetlights.

name: Camping Ave
title: (4480) Camping Ave
description:
For nature lovers

Welcome to the Camping Ave, located on one of the largest courses of water in northern Portugal – Rio Ave, which will flow into the Atlantic Ocean, a distance of few kilometres. The beaches of Vila do Conde and Póvoa de Varzim, are the sites closest to the park for all salt-water beachgoers.
Perfectly framed in nature, which has enriched with its vegetation carefully selected with care to preserve the national species and in order to move closer to vegetation in northern Europe.
Here it is natural to enjoy a peaceful scenario, ideal for nature lovers, and all those whose work and stress of life that we live call for a break, either on holiday or weekends, as great way to regain energy.
For those who prefer urban centers, with all their social, gastronomy, monuments, recreation and culture, Camping Ave is equidistant from the various urban centers of northern Portugal, to know: Vila do Conde, Póvoa de Varzim, Porto, Vila Nova de Famalicão, Trofa, Barcelos, Braga…
Thank you for your inquiry and look forward to your visit.

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - Avenida do Santuário
description: Great sunrise and far views in all directions on a hilltop next to a church. Two small bars/restaurants are nearby. The water tap is accessible. When I was there in October, the toilets were closed and there was no event going on at the church. You have to make friends with the sound of the bell, since it rings from 6 in the morning until 22h. Perfect for morning meditation, since the bell make sure that you stay focused ;)

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 115 Travessa das Rãs
description: 3 parking spaces, reserved for motorhomes, monitored by camera, quiet at night, bakery 50m away, emptying area 400m away at the Auchan store. Shims required.

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - N318
description:
Guarded parking space at a park. 4 minute drive (15 minute walk trough the park) from an camper shop. There are toilets, bins and an ice cream stand (closed on our visit in November).
4 long places , where you can stand when it is quiet. The other places were a little short, which can cause problems.

title: (4745-514) Sao Romao do Coronado - 1006 Rua Horizonte
title_short: (4745-514) Sao Romao do Coronado - 1006 Rua Horizonte
description: Small but nice place. Perfect location 5 minutes walk to the train to the city center. Outdoor showers, toilets and a bar. Pay via envelope and mailbox.

title: (4780) Santo Tirso - 152 Rua Mãe d'Água
description: Free service area next to Jumbo.

title_short: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
description: Parking next to the new Church of Santiago de Antas. Quiet and fairly smooth place to stop to eat. we don't sleep here. but on a weekday it was empty.

title_short: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado

title: (4780) - 361 Rua Rabada

title: (4745) Trofa - E1
description: It’s a gas station with a lot of parking lots, parking lots that fits motorhomes. There’s also a hotel. The grocery is not very large and doesn’t have a variety of items. It’s mainly used by truck drivers.

title_short: (4780) Couto (S. Miguel) - 382 Rua Padre Luís Gonzaga Martins Pinheiro

title: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil
title_short: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil

title: (4475-076) Castelo da Maia -
description: Parked for 2 nights. Quiet and safe. Residencial area. Close to a Pingo Doce and couple km from a Jumbo.

name: Woodstill Oaks
title: (4760-783) Woodstill Oaks
description:
We are creating a space inserted in nature.

Updates: 
- Access to the property widened to 4 meters;
- There are several vines sprouting through the ground. We kindly ask you to be as careful as possible when moving around the property;
- We kindly ask you to contact us to confirm space availability. 

Under development.
It is a property with natural fence about 50 meters from the municipal road in an extremely quiet place for contemplation of nature.  Access to the property is 4 meters wide.  At the moment we can only offer tranquility in a reserved space.  We love our trees very much;  some older than us.
 We kindly ask you to respect the space;  we have our vines growing and we think there is room for everyone, the campers and the existing nature.  We don't even have a garbage disposal as we believe that each user will take their own to the nearest place, about 150 meters from the exit.
 About 150 meters from the site, there is an equestrian center and an excellent restaurant if you want to try the local cuisine.  Within a radius of 1 km you can also visit good wine cellars and cheese makers selling to the public.  There are markets, bakeries and a bank very close to the site.
It is expressly forbidden to throw garbage to the floor and make fire.

title: (4825) Monte Córdova - CM1105
description: In the middle of nature in quiet forest next to the church of the assumption In addition if you are there on August 15 provide two nights for large market Mass and processions of the assumption. For the day only

title: (4825) - Rua Senhora do Padrão
description: Spot away from the main road. calm. at the archaeological site of "Castro de monte padrao". Walks and views. accessible all vehicles. no services. flat terrain.

title: (4470) Maia - R. Chascada
description: It is a huge parking lot in a Commercial Area (Auchan, JOM, Norauto, Low Cost Fuel and Gas, MacDonalds, etc). Access must be made from the back of Auchan and in the direction of the Fuel Pump. The Park is enormous and safe. Close to Metro but close to "Parque Industrial" or "Mandim". It can be a little noisy as it faces the road.

title: (4475) Barca - Rua de José Moreira da Silva
title_short: (4475) Barca - Rua de José Moreira da Silva
description: It is a parking space at the "Mandim" Metro Station. Since we have a lot of free space with ACs, we can park freely. Appropriate place to park / spend the night, embora esteja longe de tudo. I don't have the Metro at 20 more and I can visit Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. You can buy senha for or Metro in a vending machine. Tem um Ecocaminho 50 meters away from the Maia Zoo and the center of Maia

address.street: Rua de José Moreira da Silva

title: (4470) Maia - R. Castanheira
description: Laundry in the gallery of Auchan!!

title: (4475) Maia - 329 Rua Bernardino Machado

title: (4595) Penamaior -

title_short: (4470-407) Maia - 390B Rua José Maria Carvalho Ramos

It can be busy during the day . It has Auchan….relatively close, as well as restaurants

title: (4485) Mindelo - 693 N13

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 302 Rua das Oliveiras
description: Park of Metro Parking "Pedras Rubras". The terrain is sloping a bit. It has a lot of space available and it is safe. At the Metro station (50 mts) to reach Maia, Porto, Matosinhos, etc. Personal restaurants time.

Self-service laundry
 Convenient to park in front

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 48 Rua de Matos
description: Quiet place to park and stay overnight,street with plenty of lighting and people passing by walking pets and doing sports,also usually be on the street hawkers of fruits and vegetables,laundry nearby and several restaurants,you can not park only on Thursday from 00:00 to 17 because there is a fair on the site.Near the airport.

title: (4440) Valongo - Unnamed Road
description: High place, with beautiful views and quiet. It is near a swing that is frequently visited during the day but to sleep it is a very good place. Access is by quite broken tracks and with a lot of inclination, recommended 4x4.

title: (4470) Moreira - 6 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Good parking Park & ​​Ride located directly (20m) on the purple metro line E at the airport (3 stations) or Porto. We spent one night in early November looking for someone at the airport and we felt very comfortable there. Parking was in our time only a little busy but for the big WoMo it's pretty tight. The metro ticket, which you can buy by machine with money or a credit card has a value of 60 cents and can still be charged to the machine. You need to determine how many areas you want to drive and how many people. The ticket must be activated at the yellow terminal before the trip and go to another line. The terminal also shows how long it is still valid.

title: (4480-134) Azurara - 1 Rua Nossa Senhora das Neves
title_short: (4480-134) Azurara - 1 Rua Nossa Senhora das Neves
description: Laundry with excellent pizzeria more or less 50m away

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 1509 Avenida do Aeroporto
description: Parking space in front of a hotel.  Place recommended by the people we rented the van from.

name: Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
title: (4480-095) Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
title_short: (4480-095) Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
description:
Camping Vila do Conde / Árvore 

The Vila do Conde campsite is located in a magnificent location close to the beach. Equipped with excellent facilities, it provides all users with a pleasant leisure space during the holidays, but also a good place to rest throughout the year. 

Entrance: 9:00 am to 7:00 pm Departure: until 17:00 hours 

Visits: 9:00 to 24:00 hours 
Departure and entry of vehicles: 7:00 to 24:00 hours.

Adress: R. do Gaiato 300, 4480 Azurara, Portugal Azurara Porto 
Average Price: Between 20 & 30 EUR 
Capacity for Motorhomes (MotorHomes):  25 seats Coverage: Uncovered (Outdoors) 
Exclusive to Motorhomes: No 
Floor: Grass(Grass) 
Isolated: No 
Security: Very Good 
GPS: Latitude: 41.336199 - Longitude: -8.735268 DEGREES: 41 º 20' 10.316" - -8 º 44' 6.964"

name: Agra Pet Campsite
title: (4475-304) Agra Pet Campsite
description:
Agra Pet Campsite is here to welcome you and your pets! ?
There are 7 slots for tents and 2 for vans (max. length 5.5m)

title: (4440-703) Valongo -
description: Up a tough climb in 2WD but easy in 4x4. view of the whole quiet city and 360 degree panorama

title: (4470) Gueifães - 1201 Rua Luís da Silva Neves
title_short: (4470) Gueifães - 1201 Rua Luís da Silva Neves

title: (4480-669) Vila do Conde - 233 Acesso Particular
description: Parking at the roadside. Also suitable for large campers, provided there is space. Stood here for 2 hours to walk to the monastery. But also city sightseeing possible.

title: (4440-578) Valongo -
description: Uncontrolled parking. Access by dirt and gravel road, but easily doable by van. Nice view of the surrounding towns. Calm.

title: (4480) Cabreiro - 685 Travessa de Farilhe
description: Official beach parking, easy access to dune walkway and beach. At the back of the restaurant are public toilets (not the cleanest) which are closed during the night. Right in front of the toilets are large waste containers and one foot shower. Sadly no 'real' showers on the whole (!) Beach.

name: Vila Chã Camping
title: (4485) Vila Chã Camping
description:
Once you see the blue camping signs,  turn off Sat Nav. DO NOT turn left at the crossroads, signed dead end you will get stuck. Go straight on until you see another blue camp sign = Porto.
Few km away from Humberto Delgado airport.
Quiet site with good washrooms and showers. A well stocked shop all year used by locals on site and a bar.
There is a restaurant on site and one just outside.
The beaches are lovely and one has a safe bathing area with lifeguards. All are 10 min walking. I was told to be very careful of leaving my bike at the Metro station as it could get stolen.

title: (4480) Azurara - Rua das Salinas
description: Quiet beach. Several parking areas. Attention, place very badly attended the night.

title: (4480-876) Vila do Conde - 1 Rua Dom Sancho I
title_short: (4480-876) Vila do Conde - 1 Rua Dom Sancho I
description: Spot in the middle of nature, in the middle of the city. there is nothing. so take your rubbish with you. our night here went well. From 11 p.m. we could no longer hear the road. and even the neighboring firefighters were discreet.

title: (4425-193) Águas Santas - Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes
title_short: (4425-193) Águas Santas - Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes

address.street: Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes

description: Public parking with great views of the sea. No supply. Small snack available.

title: (4485-864) Vila Chã - 21 Largo dos Pescadores

title: (4485) Vila Chã - 405 Avenida dos Banhos
description: Small sand parking between the beach and the cornfields. suitable for one or two vans, be careful for large camping because turning around can be difficult ... small village 3min walk with bar and restaurant. perfect for a quiet night with sea views.

title: (4480-754) Vila do Conde - 31F Rua do Cais dos Assentos
title_short: (4480-754) Vila do Conde - 31F Rua do Cais dos Assentos
description: An excellent and modern launderette with large and small washers. Doesn't take credit cards though, only coins or a card that you have to buy separately (just take coins it's easier)

title_short: (4485-702) Vila Chã - 151 Rua da Praia Nova

The Novo Rumo restaurant has public showers, ideal for taking a break on the way.
At night everything was very quiet.

title_short: (4480-655) Vila do Conde - 82 Avenida Baltazar do Couto

title: () Valongo -

The driveway is not for large motorhomes, it goes over a gravel road with some potholes, but I got up easy with my T5 2WD. if you have a four wheel drive this area is perfect lots of options

title: (4770) Sezures - 422 Avenida das Cerdeirinhas

title_short: (4480-659) Vila do Conde - 582 Avenida do Brasil

title_short: (4455) Lavra - 595 Rua Professor Ofélia da Cruz Costa

We slept a night, a little passage but once the CC closed there is more passage so quieter. Toilets, cafeteria and free wifi at the commercial center

title: (4465-004) Pedrouços - 119 Rua das Cavadas
description: Shady parking all morning. There is a park very close. There were almost no cars, I think it's a university area. We have been very calm

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota
description: Green areas and filling and emptying service.

title: () Lavra -
description:
Cars passing by in daytime mainly. the airport is audible.
the forest nearby invites for a little walk. beside that nothing special. just mainly nature and woods.

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota

title_short: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro

However, this is not always open. Officially, however, this is only for the residents of the area. The front parking lot is easy to see and sunny, the rear one is a bit quieter and shady.

title: (4455-467) Perafita - 745 Rua da Guarda
description: Fill up all gas bottles from all countries!!! also the small 2.75kg campingaz. was our last resort.

title: (4455) Perafita - 178 Rua de Almeiriga Norte

title_short: (4435-127) Rio Tinto - 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares

You need to buzz yourself in on a switch on the right side of the door. There’s seats for you to sit while waiting and some tables to fold your clothes on. They have a free Wi-Fi. They have a money changer machines that takes 5, 10 and 20 euro bills.

address.street: 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares

title: (4455-420) Perafita - 2452 Rua de Almeiriga Norte
description: Small parking lot, right next to it a café with toilets and a beautiful view.

title_short: (4435-127) Venda Nova - 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva
description:
Area opposite the tram station. In 25 minutes you are in the city center.
Drinking water and drainage of gray and black water. During the day there are a lot of cars, so it is better to arrive in the evening.

address.street: 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva

title: (4435-481) Rio Tinto - 53 Alameda da Boavista
description: Automatic laundry good access, easy parking on the street. Excellent, pharmacy, supermarket and bakery

title: (4510) Valongo - 407 Rua Tenente Sá Nogueira
description: Right by the old abandoned sanatorium. Great view. ATTENTION - Access is only possible via the main road (N209) R.Cesario Verde! The access road is in good condition. You can park directly in front of the entrance or a little further up. Since it is a lost place, there is unfortunately a lot of rubbish lying around. However, you have a beautiful view.

title_short: (4440) Valongo - Rua António Augusto Castro Paupério

Very nice, view from the hill to the sea.
The public toilet is doing the job.

title: (4455) Perafita - Avenida Liberdade
description:
Ample parking in edge of Beach (praia do cabo do mundo) just behind the football field (grupo desportivo Aldeia Nova). 
no service but Beach showers. 
a small beach bar (and a restaurant in the parking lot next door) and a small playground for children. 
quiet night, direct access to the beach, beautiful views (if it doesn't the plant and its horrible chimneys behind).

title: (4435-485) Rio Tinto - 164 Avenida da Conduta
description:
Self Service laundromat with 3 Washers from 11kg to 20kg and also 3 Dryers.
cash or card accepted. 
snack machine with online payment only (water, juices and snacks).
WI FI available and power plug.

title: (4510-591) Fânzeres - 22 Rua Lordelo
description: Perfect place to spend the night and visit the city's train station a two-minute walk away

title: (4350-414) Porto - R. Do Repelão
description: Place near a service area that is also a Park and Ride with metro Fanzeres right in front with a Mercadona near. This area is bigger and have less CC and AC than the other one, so it is a good alternative if it is full or with too much noise.

title: (4460-161) Senhora da Hora - 584 Avenida Senhora da Hora
title_short: (4460-161) Senhora da Hora - 584 Avenida Senhora da Hora
description: Good to sleep over night. Next to public transport metro.

title: (4490-013) Póvoa de Varzim - 131 Avenida dos Pescadores
title_short: (4490-013) Póvoa de Varzim - 131 Avenida dos Pescadores
description: Old soccer field. Possible to stay overnight. Calm place. PAY.

title: (4460-282) Porto - 12364 Estrada da Circunvalação
description: Parking, no payment. NorteShopping Shopping Center

title: (4200-105) Porto -
description:
Quiet avenue with free parking spaces.
 Near a supermarket (incl. Toilets and cash machine) and a lunchroom.
The public park / children's playground "Quinta do Covelo" and the metro station "Salgueiros" are both a 5 minute walk.

title: (4450) Leça da Palmeira - Avenida Liberdade
description: Suitable for the night. He has a local chill out at the seaside to take something calm while the sun goes down. In your back is the refinery although at night with all these lights, it has its charm although its noise can be embarrassing for some people.

title: (4200-604) Porto - 131 Rua Professor Joaquim Bastos
description: Quiet place in an urbanization, in front of lidl. Good to park during the day or spend the night quietly. 30 min walk from the center.

title: (4450-271) Matosinhos - 256 Rua Sendim
description: Open parking and very large. There are a lot of street lights and a lot of passing close enough but we had two quiet nights without any problems.

title: (4805) Nespereira - Unnamed Road / Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo
title_short: (4805) Nespereira - Unnamed Road /  Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo
description: Great point of view to land and see the city at night or watch a sunset. Continue to the top to find flatter places. Be careful steep and small ways to get there. Not recommended for motorhomes!

address.street: Unnamed Road /  Capela das Senhoras do Monte, Serzedelo

title: (4755-520) Várzea - 127 Rua de São Bento
description: Large parking lot, all flat. Alongside river with picnic tables under trees over small bridge. Trees along river for shade.

title: (4250-316) Porto - 309 Rua do Monte dos Burgos
title_short: (4250-316) Porto - 309 Rua do Monte dos Burgos
description: Excellent free parking area, well located. Without disturbing anyone. No clean waters, no dirty waters.

title: (4440) Campo - 902 Rua de São João
description: Large parking lot with toilets. Came here because of the great climbing offer in the immediate vicinity.

title: (4460-282) Senhora da Hora - 15 Praceta da Aldeia Nova
title_short: (4460-282) Senhora da Hora - 15 Praceta da Aldeia Nova
description: Nice place to park near Norte shopping centre, where it is very difficult to park large vans, Residencial area where I found a few motorhomes parked.

title: (4200) Porto - 369 Rua Oliveira Martins
description: Flat place to park and spend the night, seemingly quiet

title: (4490-079) A Ver-o-Mar - 134 Rua do Sargaceiro
description: Parking lots by the coast, you can spend the night but without camping.  Direct access to the beach and sea.

title: (4350-158) Porto - 2 Colónia Antero de Quental
description: Gas station with water. Sometimes stops flowing, but with patience we filled up our tank in maybe 15 min

title: (4450) Matosinhos - 25 Rua Misericórdia
description: Quiet parking lot near the port of Porto. Very empty on weekends, full during the day during the week. We stayed here for two nights. Many good restaurants about 1.2 km away, also beach and bus stop. Supermarket around the corner. A playground is next to the parking lot.

title: (4450) Leça da Palmeira - 65 Avenida Liberdade
description: Perfect place to spend the night. Quiet and close to the beach. Good views. No services but there is a bar nearby.

title: (4350-226) Porto - 202 Rua do Monte Aventino
description: Free parking spot with space for our Mercedes’ sprinter. We parked here and stayed in an Airbnb in the centre for 3 days and it was perfect for that. I think it would be quiet to spend the night and quite flat. No longer vehicles than 6m I imagine

title: (4450-590) Leça da Palmeira - 81 Rua Armando Leça
title_short: (4450-590) Leça da Palmeira - 81 Rua Armando Leça
description: Large, easy-access car park, many places available when we parked, no prohibition sign.

title: (4450-108) Matosinhos - 22 Rua de Damão
description: Great parking lot to overnight. I stayed a couple nights here and I will be back for sure. It’s really spacious and next to a school (which gives me a sense of security). Free parking

title: (4510) Fânzeres - 364 Travessa Manariz Baixo
description: Park next to passadicos de fanzeres

title: (4350-085) Porto - 171 Rua Carlos Graça
description: A few parking spaces along a park. Slightly sloping. Glass bins at the end of the street, A little traffic during the day, little during the night. Lidl store approx. 500m bus station to get to the city center. May be suitable for 2-3 nights.

title: (4450-718) Leça da Palmeira - 65 Avenida Liberdade
description: Place along the avenue de la Liberté, next to the beach (sand and rock), public shower at the beach, restaurants-bar nearby. Calme

title: (4050-221) Porto - 449 Rua de Alves Redol
description: Just a parking space

title: (4450-620) Leça da Palmeira - 433 Avenida Antunes Guimarães
title_short: (4450-620) Leça da Palmeira - 433 Avenida Antunes Guimarães
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (4000-191) Porto - 139 Rua do Major David Magno
title_short: (4000-191) Porto - 139 Rua do Major David Magno
description:
Peaceful place. You will have a art school in the block, but they are cool people.
I stay there 3 days and nights and don't have complains, you will have a big market (lidl) and a café near by.
This place is nearby the center of porto.

title: (4050) Porto - 484 Rua de 5 de Outubro
description: Small parking suitable for mobile homes, height approx. 3.5m, nice private operator (can only speak Portuguese or French!), the gates are open from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.

title: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - 58 Rua da Marginal
title_short: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - 58 Rua da Marginal
description: Good beach all year round. Quiet and safe place. Ideal for visiting Aver-O-Mar and Póvoa de Varzim on foot or by bike.

title: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - Rua da Marginal
title_short: (4495) Póvoa de Varzim - Rua da Marginal
description: Quiet and safe place. Do not open the awning, tables or chairs outdoors.

title: (4450) Matosinhos - 30 Rua Heróis de França
description: Docapesca private parking. Ideal for visiting the typical restaurants of the region and the beach of Matosinhos. The nearby metro station leading to the center of Porto

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Place in nature and easy access. A large flat land ideal for motorhome. Some rubbish but beautiful quiet place with some trails in the middle of the forest. Path wide enough paved. No services.

title: (4300-340) Porto - 148 Travessa Bonjóia
description: From the sleeping area you have a wonderful view over Porto and the Campanha train station is only a 15-minute walk away. Unfortunately it is quite noisy because of the big street, but that didn't bother us.

title: (4585) Gandra - 513 Rua dos Casais
description:
Gigantic parking lot. And calm!

Suitable for overnight, if not just a football match is raging.

title: (4300) Porto - 126 Travessa das Eirinhas
description: Parking next to a hospital. Quiet, 30-40 minutes walk from the city center. very wide parking with several sectors. Makes a good impression with the naked eye. No problem as we read about the surroundings.

title: (4000) Porto - Largo da Lapa
description: Safe and quiet area to spend the day . In the Church area paid parking.

title: (4495) Aguçadoura, - Marginal da Caturela
description:
A beautiful pitch in direct on the beach 25m to the sea. No infrastructure (toilet, etc) available. From time to time cars pass by at night. Otherwise very quiet.
Do not open awning or place tables or rows outside.

title: (4050-021) Porto - 71 Rua do Melo
description: Parking fee limited to 4 hours a day

title: (4300-241) Porto - 54 Rua Conselheiro Correia de Barros
title_short: (4300-241) Porto - 54 Rua Conselheiro Correia de Barros
description: Parcking space in a dead end street, very calm during night and day. There is an elementary school beside, so it may be noisy during the day when hollydays are over. It is not far from the city center, not far from a bouldering hall! a lot of cars are parked, but during the 2 days we where there, there was always some free space.

title: (4100-431) Porto - 59 Rua Teixeira de Vasconcelos
description: A very quiet pine forest to park and be alone. Spacious, quiet and shaded. It is located next to a cemetery, otherwise it is perfect to spend the day. Close to parks and easy access.

title: (4100) Porto - 64 Beco Carreiras
description: Parking lanes in a neat environment. We slept relatively peacefully here. Nevertheless, we would come back here because it seems safe and is right on the edge of the Parque da cidade di Porto. Overnight stay apparently tolerated. no problems. and the morning can start with a wonderful coffee from the "Soundwich" restaurant...

title: (4300) Porto - 495 Rua de Barros Lima
description: Good possibility to park the motorhome, for a trip to the city center of Porto. The parking lot is right next to the cemetery Bonfim. The city center is about 2 km walk. To stay it is probably too loud and a bit weird. We parked here twice, saw other campers park here and had great days in Porto. No service and no restrictions.

title: (4450-084) Matosinhos - 670 Rua Brito e Cunha
description: Free parking space at the foot of the Sheraton hotel, secured by its CCTV cameras. Park just in front, with the beach 2 min walk. Quiet night. Arrived after dinner to find a seat is advised.

title: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 156 Rua da Praia
title_short: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 156 Rua da Praia
description: Public parking. Quiet and safe place. Do not open the awning, tables or chairs outdoors.

title: (4000) Porto - 219 Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão
description: Parking on the street. Space under the aerial street of 6m long.

title: (4000-269) Porto - 331 Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão
description: Is an underground parking with up to 2,3mts

title: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 20 Rua da Praia
title_short: (4495-031) Póvoa de Varzim - 20 Rua da Praia
description:
Ideal place to spend the night. Restaurant, supermarket, playground nearby.
Trash can.
Beautiful beach.
WE a little noisy by quad that spend the night.

title: (4100) Porto - N12
description: Picnic tables under trees. There is a parking lot just opposite, very convenient to unload the things to eat. In the park there are public toilets and a fountain.

title: (4450) Porto - 15322 Estrada da Circunvalação
description: Good spot near tennis court with access to the forest

title: (4495-052) Póvoa de Varzim - 42 Marginal do Cruzeiro
title_short: (4495-052) Póvoa de Varzim - 42 Marginal do Cruzeiro
description: Small nice and quiet car park for one night in total autonomy, no service. At the bottom of a dead end. You can leave the van or camper there and do everything on foot or by bike.

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Dusty spot by a river in the middle of the nature, shady and  nearby a small settlement. Not suitable for large vehicles (max length 7m max width 2m). Steep and narrow access with bad route.

title: (4450-208) Matosinhos - Avenida Norton de Matos
description: Parking along the paved avenue that runs along the beach. Ideal for enjoying the beach or strolling along the coast. Free toilets in the mall, beach shower without soap. Avoid coming in the day to have a place. Rather quiet at night but cars can pass close.

title: (4705-444) Celeirós - 87 Avenida de São Lourenço
description: Self service wash and dry

name: Escola EB1/Jl Aldeia - Aguçadoura
title: (4495-002) Escola EB1/Jl Aldeia - Aguçadoura
description: Quiet parking next to the beach. Being the dunes you cannot see the sea, but it is next to the access walkway. There is a shower for bathers coming off the beach, there are also recycling bins and a supermarket next door, with a very friendly man. There is a bar nearby to use the bathroom if you don't have one.

title: (4100-376) Porto - 279 Avenida do Parque
description: Calm place and with enough green air and trees to park. Fica weekends more cheio because of the park that I have visited. The final year of the street in the park Saturday pela manhã has a fair of Bio products, cafes and restaurants. Excellent

title: (4750-303) Barcelos - 119 Rua Rosa Ramalho
description: Nice place next to the beautiful river beach. Very busy with locals on sunny days, we stayed the night and it was very peaceful.

title: (4450) Porto - 15282 Estrada da Circunvalação
description:
One of the safest places I found yet in Porto. stayed there for the night without a problem. 

You can find toilets, drinking water and outsider shower in the park. 

Pretty nice calm place close to the Matosinhos beach.

title: (4750-331) Barcelos - 38 Rua Rosa Ramalho
description: Free parking, WC available in swimming pool area

title: (4570) Aguçadoura - 1562 Rua da Codixeira
description: Superb picnic area below the big parking (it is noisy), with barbecues and water available (currently water under construction because of the stadium site). We stayed at night with CC heavy weight, no noise, beach 100m ........ access without any weight limit and size .... much better than parking above ...... thirty places all around ...

title: (4100) Porto - Praça da Cidade do Salvador
title_short: (4100) Porto - Praça da Cidade do Salvador
description: Parking 15 places around the anemone roundabout, very popular during the day, but close to beaches and restaurants.  There is a bicycle shop across the street.

title: (4300) Porto -
description: Public shower and laundry, shower, toilets. a washing machine

title: (4815) Vizela - 629 N106
description: Optimal quiet park to visit Parque das Termas de Vizela. Pingo Doce supermarket, 100m away.

title: (4050-359) Porto - 78 Praça do Coronel Pacheco
description:
Payed parking close to the city centre. Perfect to explore Porto on a day trip. It's not suitable for big campers, but there is enough space for smaller ones like VW Bus, Ford Nugget and short Sprinter like vans. You can stay a maximum of 2h, but you can always come back and pay for another 2h.
There are some beggars that help on finding a spot and at the ticket machine. They look after the car if you give them some money, which worked for us at least.

title: () Porto -
description: Free toilets with the option of a shower (probably only open morning/afternoon) in the center of Parque da Cidade de Porto, a few minutes from Matosinhos beach and Castelo del Queijo. Access to the park is on foot and you can have a picnic or spend the afternoon/day on any side of the meadows. In the surroundings there are several car parks where it is not necessary to pay.

title: (4150-430) Porto - 172 Rua João Martins Branco
description: Quiet place Next Boavista

title: (4100-062) Porto - 17 Rua de António Aroso
description: Place with many squares, at night there are few cars parked. Peaceful place. During the day, all the parking lots are almost full. There will be a lot of people therefore, if someone wanted to do something bad, they would be seen. In front of a park, bus stop and next to the road.

title: (4570) Aguçadoura - 1532 Rua da Codixeira
description: Some nighttime locals joyriding there cars was quite entertaining. Otherwise chilled spot

title: (4750-304) Barcelos - 290 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Parking in front of the Barcelos segundaria school 800m from the historic center all museums are free!!! pretty town Avoid on Thursday, market day

title: (4000) Porto - 17 Rua da Conceição
description: Very central lavadaria and close to monuments.

title: (4750) Barcelos - 149 Rua Duques de Bragança
description: Quiet and river side. Barcelos.

title: (4750) Barcelos - 322 Rua Doutor José António Peixoto Pereira Machado
title_short: (4750) Barcelos - 322 Rua Doutor José António Peixoto Pereira Machado
description: Nice sunny and queit place. Near city center.

address.street: 322 Rua Doutor José António Peixoto Pereira Machado

title: (4805) Guimarães - Rua dos Carvalhais
description: Decathlon parking. 10 minutes from the historic center. In the city we park relatively close to the center.

title: (4300-197) Porto - 159 Rua do Conde de Ferreira
title_short: (4300-197) Porto - 159 Rua do Conde de Ferreira
description: Street parking for nominal fee (free on the weekend!!)… up to 4hrs… Some long bays between trees, I’m an L4H3 and got in comfortable… - not suitable for ‘proper’ motorhomes, just vans I think. If you come to this location, then neighbouring streets have lots of bays similar! About a 15min walk to the center but lots of cafes on way!

title: (4150-178) Porto - Rua do Campo Alegre 439
description: SABA - Campo Alegre parking space.

title: (4100) Porto - 71 Rua Particular Nº 2 Castelo do Queijo
title_short: (4100) Porto - 71 Rua Particular Nº 2 Castelo do Queijo
description:
We stayed here over night, only 5 minutes to the beach and right next to a park. 
It's next to the big road but very quiet. A stray dog kept us company, he was a little annoying but other than that a great place to stay for the night especially because of the location!

address.street: 71 Rua Particular Nº 2 Castelo do Queijo

title: (4000-526) Porto - 287 Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas
title_short: (4000-526) Porto - 287 Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas
description: Some relatively long parking spots under the shadow of trees. Good to park a van/small RV for a short visit to the city. Max. parking duration is 2h but you can buy a new ticket after this time. Shops/Cafes/Restaurants nearby.

title: (4100-429) Porto - 395 Via do Castelo do Queijo
title_short: (4100-429) Porto - 395 Via do Castelo do Queijo
description: Parking during the day without problems. Day trip to the city and bathing in the sea. Possibility to rent an electric scooter on site via app.

title: (4150-564) Porto - 215 Via Panorâmica Edgar Cardoso
description: Parking close to university campuses.

title: (4100) Porto - 94 Rua de Cabo Verde
description: Quiet parking near the ocean and its large paths and the large park. Near Montevideu Avenue and Boavista. Very good for a quiet night very close to Porto.

title: (4000-198) Porto - 52 Rua de Entreparedes
description:
Marlin Wash
3 washing machines, 2 dryers

title: (4300) Porto - 38B Praça da Alegria
description: Free, drinkable water. Free parking places (not a lot but still free), lots of shade and some stone banches.

title: (4050-290) Porto - 26 Rua de São Filipe de Nery
title_short: (4050-290) Porto - 26 Rua de São Filipe de Nery
description: Guarded parking garage. Super central.

address.street: 26 Rua de São Filipe de Nery

title: (4750) Tamel (São Veríssimo) - 111 Travessa do Cávado
description: Very quiet place. No services. Riverside.

title: (4000) Porto - 95 Rua dos Caldeireiros
description: Laundry in downtown area of Porto, prices are not cheap but it works well and the place is very neat. Prices include detergent and fabric softener. It works from 7:00 to 00:00 from Monday to Monday.

title: (4750) Manhente - Rua do Rio
description:
A somewhat uneven sandy parking lot with trees and shade.  Suitable for cars, motorhomes and camper vans that are not too big.

Fine pebble position 100 meters long and max. 30 meters wide.  Pebble river shallow, without plants and clear water and sparkling waterfall.

Cozy piece of nature with 10 picnic tables and 1 barbeque.  Recommended!

title: (4755) Areias de Vilar - 15 Lugar do Socorro
title_short: (4755) Areias de Vilar - 15 Lugar do Socorro
description: Picnic area in front of a church, several tables available. About twenty parking spaces. Shaded area, with water tap and toilets (closed during our visit).

title: (4570-218) Póvoa de Varzim - 10 Rua da Praia
title_short: (4570-218) Póvoa de Varzim - 10 Rua da Praia
description: Parking very close to the beach, a few people.

title: (4150) Porto - 76 Rua Grão Magriço
description: Very quiet parking day

title: (4050-367) Porto - 135 Rua de São Bento da Vitória
title_short: (4050-367) Porto - 135 Rua de São Bento da Vitória
description: Free parking day and night, near the beautiful monuments of Porto on foot and the center. The car park is in an area surrounded by restaurants, cafes and shopping centers with wifi, toilets and water points.

address.street: 135 Rua de São Bento da Vitória

title: (4000-054) Porto - 75 Rua de Alexandre Herculano
description: 3 washing machines and 2 dryers

title: (4050-076) Porto - 9 Rua De Azevedo De Albuquerque
title_short: (4050-076) Porto - 9 Rua De Azevedo De Albuquerque
description: Parking in the center of Porto. Busy but quiet area. Free overnight parking. During the day you must put a ticket every 2 hours

title: (4150) Porto - Rua do Molhe 403
description: Free parking for about 10-15 motorhomes. No services. Quiet place, no traffic noise, 30m there is a bus stop. About 15 minutes from the beach and Parque da Cidade. We spent 2 nights here with no problem.

title: (4000) Porto - 262 Rua de Mouzinho da Silveira
title_short: (4000) Porto - 262 Rua de Mouzinho da Silveira
description: Parking on the street, on Rua de Mouzinho da Silveira, steep and noisy but obviously one of the safest places to park at night and be able to leave the AC for the day to go around. Everything close. There are no explicit prohibition signs, from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. you have to put parking every 2 hours. I stayed one night and day and received no fines or warnings. Security in Porto is important, many car parks with a history of theft but here it does not seem to be easy for thieves. If you want tranquility this is NOT the place.

title: (4150) Porto - 131 Alameda Doutor Fernando Azeredo Antas
title_short: (4150) Porto - 131 Alameda Doutor Fernando Azeredo Antas
description: Parking near the beaches in the north of Porto. shops and bus at the end of the street

title: (4000-013) Porto - 9 Rua do Corpo da Guarda
title_short: (4000-013) Porto - 9 Rua do Corpo da Guarda
description: Trash can and water fountain right in front of Sé Cathedral. There is also plenty of parking space for small vehicles and VAN n (no motorhome). However, be careful with parking.

title: (4300-059) Porto - 69 Largo Padre Baltasar Guedes
description: Parking in front of the official fire department building. Small impasse just below, a lot of shade, flat and relatively quiet at night. We stayed 2 nights. 1.5km walk from the center of Porto.
